holidays.title: Chadwick Boseman Day
holidays.description: On Chadwick Boseman's birthday, we remember the actor who sadly left us too soon.

holidays.title: National Lemon Cream Pie Day
holidays.description: We hope your sweet tooth is ready to celebrate National Lemon Cream Pie Day!

holidays.title: Buy Nothing Day
holidays.description: An effort to combat the unethical and sometimes even dangerous mob shopping behaviors of Black Friday.

holidays.title: Electronic Greetings Day
holidays.description: Let’s reach out to long-lost friends via email or social media this Electronic Greetings Day.

holidays.title: Fur-Free Friday
holidays.description: Today we denounce our cruelty, in the name of fashion, to fur-bearing animals.

holidays.title: International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People
holidays.description: Stand up for a true cause today — stand up for the independence of Palestinians.

holidays.title: International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People
holidays.description: With the ongoing Israeli-Palestinian conflict, everyone should be informed and raise awareness of the situation.

holidays.title: Isdal Woman Day
holidays.description: Learn about the Isdal Woman case, and the best ways to observe this day.

holidays.title: Maize Day
holidays.description: The time has come to unwrap and savor this gift of nature.

holidays.title: National Day of Listening
holidays.description: There's something interesting for everyone to say or hear, so listen up!

holidays.title: Native American Heritage Day
holidays.description: Native Americans form the foundation of American culture, and that makes this day special.

holidays.title: Sigd Day
holidays.description: Uncover the ancient traditions and history of Jewish communities you didn’t know existed.

holidays.title: Sinkie Day
holidays.description: Are you a sinkie? This special day was created just for you!

holidays.title: Square Dancing Day
holidays.description: Put on your dancing shoes and practice square dancing with your friends and loved ones!

holidays.title: Systems Engineer Day
holidays.description: Systems Engineer Day celebrates those who create computer systems and debug those with problems.

holidays.title: Throw Out Your Leftovers Day
holidays.description: It’s time to throw out your leftovers and make space for fresh and healthy food.

holidays.title: You’re Welcomegiving Day
holidays.description: We’re learning new ways to say “you’re welcome” on this exciting day!

holidays.title: Anna Faris’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has played numerous roles in films that were critically acclaimed and considered classic.

holidays.title: Brian Baumgartner’s Birthday
holidays.description: This hilarious actor, director, and podcast host will you laugh for sure.

holidays.title: C.S. Lewis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This theologian and English writer was an inspiring figure way ahead of his time.

holidays.title: Chadwick Boseman’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor will always be remembered for his talent and the characters he potrayed so skillfully.

holidays.title: Chris Chann’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber is garnering fame and success, thanks to his entertaining content!

holidays.title: Don Cheadle’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented filmmaker and actor has been awarded several awards including two Grammys.

holidays.title: Fawad Khan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fawad Khan is the doe-eyed actor winning hearts across borders with his talent and charm.

holidays.title: Howie Mandel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Entertainment has always been a part of this comedian and television personality’s life.

holidays.title: Kennedy Cymone’s Birthday
holidays.description: Kennedy Cymone  Knight found fame in her YouTube channel titled Kennedy Cymone, initially called FabulousInMaking.

holidays.title: Laura Marano’s Birthday
holidays.description: Marano is a talented lady who is not only gifted in acting but also singing.

holidays.title: Louisa May Alcott’s Birthday
holidays.description: We will help you celebrate this author-turned-feminist icon who paved the way for us!

holidays.title: Reginae Carter’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper is expanding across multiple niches and ventures. Learn more as we celebrate!

holidays.title: Russell Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This athlete has been playing football since high school and, today, he's in the big league!

holidays.title: The Game’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Game knows how to play the game! Let's dive into his life and career achievements.

holidays.title: Tiffany Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: This is how Tiffany Smith navigated the seas of Hollywood and landed on the perfect shore.

holidays.title: Vin Scully’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the record-breaking sportscaster who ruled the airwaves for several decades.
